code: import api from"../api";var getAllEmployees=function getAllEmployees(){return api.get("employees");};var createEmployee=function createEmployee(emp){return api.post("/employees",emp);};var updateEmployee=function updateEmployee(id,emp){return api.put("/employees/".concat(id),emp);};var deleteEmployee=function deleteEmployee(id){return api.delete("/employees/".concat(id));};export{getAllEmployees,createEmployee,updateEmployee,deleteEmployee};
